person.persName: Jefferson Brown (AKA Jeff. Brown/Jeff Brown. Louisville attorney)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and notary. Pewee Valley, Kentucky, native. Studied law at Augusta College in Augusta, Kentucky. Lived in Morganfield, Kentucky. Clerk of Union County Court. Representative of Union County, Kentucky, in the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Attorney in Louisville from 1858.
